slidetranscripts.slidetranscript: <Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="You aren’t well enough prepared to interview the owner yet." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="You don’t have enough data to assess materiality." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>
